channel.title: InYourBones — Bay Area Radar (short_term)
channel.description: Curated upcoming Bay Area shows from InYourBones.

item.title: Benson Boone @ Bill Graham Civic Auditorium
item.description: 2026-02-06 04:00 — Benson Boone at Bill Graham Civic Auditorium. Benson Boone is an emerging indie artist with a growing fanbase, making this a notable event.

item.description: 2026-02-07 04:30 — Martin Garrix at Bill Graham Civic Auditorium. Martin Garrix is a leading figure in electronic music, and his collaboration with Lost Frequencies adds significant appeal.

item.description: 2026-01-31 04:00 — Cate Le Bon at The Fillmore. Cate Le Bon's unique sound and strong live reputation make her show at The Fillmore a must-see.
